forum.name: WU Optional Forum: Sharing & Revising Your EI Lesson for a Content Learning
forum.intro:
There are two parts to this Optional Discussion:

First, revisit your posted assignment for Session 6. Review facilitator feedback on your EI lesson for Content Learning and make any revisions to your lesson plan.

Second, share your revised completed EI lesson for Content Learning with your peers on this Discussion Forum, and request specific feedback. (You can upload a document to this forum just like you do for an assignment.) 
 

Examples of specific requests: 

  • “Do you think my graphic organizer is appropriate for this content and/or level 3 learners?” 
  • “The facilitator suggested I lengthen my plans for scaffolded practice – what do you think of them now?”  

To enhance your learning: We encourage you to provide constructive feedback on your peers’ plans in this forum. In particular, please address any specific questions your peers ask in their posts.

 

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on an "Explicit Instruction" link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Main Course Outline and access the next course activity.

Note: This item will not automatically mark itself complete on the main course outline until you have posted.
